records.text: God is working out God’s purposes. That’s God’s doing ultimately, not ours.We don’t know how the Kingdom is emerging, or where or when. But it is.  We participate in the Kingdom’s revelation like a small boat moving in front of a great wind on the waves of the sea. We don’t direct the wind, or know where the waves come from - but we are moved by them as they both move us in a new direction.https://entangledstates.org/2024/06/15/god-is-working-out-gods-purposes-thats-gods-doing-ultimately-not-ours/

records.text: I’m planning my Lenten Journey for 2025. I am not used to planning ahead like this, but it is time to make some changes.  Especially since I fooled around and didn’t do anything this year. So I’m going to read the Gospel of Thomas and meditate on each saying. I fell that GThom was a prayer book for folks 1900 years ago. So I’m going to try and experience GThom this way myself. I will start by reading GThom through a couple of times this summer and fall to become familiar with it again. I will post here on my progress. See you son.

records.text: I’m planning my Lenten Journey for 2025. I am not used to planning ahead like this, but it is time to make some changes.  Especially since I fooled around and didn’t do anything this year. So I’m going to read the Gospel of Thomas and meditate on each saying. I fell that GThom was a prayer book for folks 1900 years ago. So I’m going to try and experience GThom this way myself. I will start by reading GThom through a couple of times this summer and fall to become familiar with it again. I will post here on my progress. See you son.

records.text: God is working out God’s purposes. That’s God’s doing ultimately, not ours.We don’t know how the Kingdom is emerging, or where or when. But it is.  We participate in the Kingdom’s revelation like a small boat moving in front of a great wind on the waves of the sea. We don’t direct the wind, or know where the waves come from - but we are moved by them as they both move us in a new direction.https://entangledstates.org/2024/06/15/god-is-working-out-gods-purposes-thats-gods-doing-ultimately-not-ours/

It’s just sad because it doesn’t have to be this way.#Sad #Frustrated #Annoyed #Angry
